title: The WHO's Chief Says It Was Premature To Rule Out A Lab Leak As The Pandemic's Origin
content:
1. The WHO's Chief Says It Was Premature To Rule Out A Lab Leak As The Pandemic's Origin  NPR
  2. WHO chief says it was 'premature' to rule out COVID lab leak  Yahoo News
  3. Can We Handle the Truth of the COVID-Origin Probe?  National Review
  4. 48 countries call for stopping politicizing virus origins tracing in a joint letter  Global Times
  5. Another devastating pandemic 'inevitable' if nothing changes, WHO warns  Yahoo News UK
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: WHO長官、パンデミックの原因を研究室の漏洩と断定するのは時期尚早と語る
世卫组织负责人表示，排除实验室泄漏是大流行病的起源为时过早。
世衛組織負責人表示，排除實驗室泄漏是大流行病的起源爲時過早。
